profile:
Bros. Roofing has provided high-quality roofing services to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Bros. Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Bros. Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. 
Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!
All our services are competitively priced and we provide educational information as well. 

You can count on us:
Most Affordable and Excellenct Roofing Service For You~~

profile:
Founded in 2009, Rockwell Masonry is quickly becoming known as a company with a high standard for quality and reliability. Our commitment to excellence enables us to serve in a way that consistently exceeds our customers’ expectations. Regardless of the size of the project, we always strive to put our clients’ needs first. Putting in the extra effort has always been a key part of the Rockwell Masonry philosophy.

Our customers include homeowners and builders in Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington and the GTA.
